metadata.title: CVE-2021-28677 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Pillow before 8.2.0. For EPS data, the readlineimplementation used in EPSImageFile has to deal with any combination of \rand \n as line endings. It used an accidentally quadratic method ofaccumulating lines while looking for a line ending. A malicious EPS filecould use this to perform a DoS of Pillow in the open phase, before animage was accepted for opening.

criterions.comment: pillow package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
